Question: What are the names and dates of birth of the players who represent the team 'Germany' and played in the '2022' tournament?
Cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[represents:REPRESENTS]->(team:Team {name:"Germany"})
MATCH (player)-[:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament {year:2022})
RETURN player, represents, team, match, tournament, player.name, player.dob
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[represents:REPRESENTS]->(team:Team {name:"Germany"})
MATCH (player)-[relation5:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[relation6:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament {year:2022})
RETURN relation6, relation5, player, represents, team, match, tournament, player.name, player.dob
Rewrite: Can you provide the names and birthdates of players who represented the team 'Germany' in the '2022' tournament?

Question: Can you identify the stages and dates of the matches where the squad named 'Italy 2024' played during the '2024' tournament?
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[named:NAMED]->(squad:Squad {id:"Italy 2024"})-[:FOR]->(tournament:Tournament {year:2024})
MATCH (team)-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament)
RETURN team, named, squad, played_in, match, in_tournament, tournament, match.stage, match.date
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[named:NAMED]->(squad:Squad {id:"Italy 2024"})-[relation5:FOR]->(tournament:Tournament {year:2024})
MATCH (team)-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament)
RETURN relation5, team, named, squad, played_in, match, in_tournament, tournament, match.stage, match.date
Rewrite: Could you specify the phases and timings of the games in which the team called 'Italy 2024' participated in the '2024' tournament?

Question: I need the names of all players who played for the Argentine team in the '2018' World Cup and were also represented by the same squad in another tournament.
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"Argentina"})-[:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament {year:2018}),
      (player:Person)-[:REPRESENTS]->(team),
      (player)-[played_in_wc:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament),
      (player)-[in_squad_wc:IN_SQUAD]->(squad:Squad)-[:FOR]->(tournament),
      (player)-[in_squad_other:IN_SQUAD]->(squad)-[:FOR]->(other_tournament:Tournament)
WHERE other_tournament.id <> tournament.id
RETURN player, played_in_wc, match, in_squad_wc, squad, in_squad_other, other_tournament, team, tournament, player.name
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"Argentina"})-[relation6:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament {year:2018}),
      (player:Person)-[relation7:REPRESENTS]->(team),
      (player)-[played_in_wc:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[relation9:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament),
      (player)-[in_squad_wc:IN_SQUAD]->(squad:Squad)-[relation13:FOR]->(tournament),
      (player)-[in_squad_other:IN_SQUAD]->(squad)-[:FOR]->(other_tournament:Tournament)
WHERE other_tournament.id <> tournament.id
RETURN relation13, relation9, relation7, relation6, player, played_in_wc, match, in_squad_wc, squad, in_squad_other, other_tournament, team, tournament, player.name
Semantic-EQL-Question: Can you list all players from Argentina’s 2018 World Cup team, including the matches they played and any other tournament squads they were part of in the same year?
Rewrite: I require a list of all athletes who competed for the Argentine squad in the 2018 World Cup and participated with the same team in a different competition.

Question: Please provide the year and name of each tournament in which the 'Spain National Team' has participated along with its corresponding squad's details.
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"Spain National Team"})-[participated:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament), (team)-[named:NAMED]->(squad:Squad)-[in_for:FOR]->(tournament)
RETURN team, participated, tournament, named, squad, in_for, tournament.year, tournament.name
Rewrite: Kindly list every tournament involving the 'Spain National Team' by year and name, including the specifics of each participating squad.

Question: List all the team names and match dates for the matches that occurred in the 'Brazil 2014' part of the tournament.
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament {name:"Brazil 2014"})
RETURN team, played_in, match, in_tournament, tournament, team.name, match.date
Rewrite: Provide all the team names and the dates of the matches that took place during the 'Brazil 2014' segment of the tournament.

Question: Could you list the names of the coaches who have coached a squad participating in any World Cup tournament held between 1990 and 2022?
Cypher:
MATCH (coach:Person)-[coach_for:COACH_FOR]->(squad:Squad)-[for_tournament:FOR]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year >= 1990 AND tournament.year <= 2022
RETURN coach, coach_for, squad, for_tournament, tournament, coach.name
Rewrite: Could you provide the names of the coaches who have led a team in any World Cup tournament from 1990 to 2022?

Question: Which minutes did players from the squad 'England 2022' score goals during matches in the 'semi-final' stage of the '2022 World Cup'?
Cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[scored_goal:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
MATCH (player)-[:IN_SQUAD]->(squad:Squad)-[:FOR]->(tournament)
WHERE squad.id="England 2022" AND tournament.shortName="2022 World Cup" AND match.stage="semi-final"
RETURN player, scored_goal, match, tournament, squad, scored_goal.minute
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[scored_goal:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[relation5:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
MATCH (player)-[relation6:IN_SQUAD]->(squad:Squad)-[relation7:FOR]->(tournament)
WHERE squad.id="England 2022" AND tournament.shortName="2022 World Cup" AND match.stage="semi-final"
RETURN relation7, relation6, relation5, player, scored_goal, match, tournament, squad, scored_goal.minute
Rewrite: At what times did members of the 'England 2022' team score goals in the 'semi-final' round of the '2022 World Cup'?

Question: Can you tell me how many goals were scored and at what minutes by the 'France' team in the group stages of the '1998 World Cup'?
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"France"})-[participated:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament {shortName:"1998 World Cup"}),
      (person:Person)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament),
      (person)-[represents:REPRESENTS]->(team)
WHERE match.stage="group"
RETURN team, participated, tournament, person, scored, match, in_tournament, represents, scored.minute
Rewrite: Could you inform me about the number of goals and the specific times they were scored by the 'France' team during the group stages of the '1998 World Cup'?

Question: What are the scores and types of play (goal, penalty) for matches involving the 'Brazil' team during the '2002' tournament's knockout phase?
Cypher:
MATCH (brazilTeam:Team {name:"Brazil"})-[:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament {year:2002}),
      (brazilTeam)-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament),
      (match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament)
WHERE match.stage CONTAINS "knockout"
RETURN brazilTeam, played_in, match, in_tournament, tournament, played_in.score, played_in.type
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (brazilTeam:Team {name:"Brazil"})-[relation3:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament {year:2002}),
      (brazilTeam)-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[relation5:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament),
      (match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament)
WHERE match.stage CONTAINS "knockout"
RETURN relation5, relation3, brazilTeam, played_in, match, in_tournament, tournament, played_in.score, played_in.type
Rewrite: What were the results and methods of scoring (goal, penalty) in the games featuring the 'Brazil' team in the knockout stage of the '2002' tournament?

Question: I need details on when (minutes) and how ('type' of play) players of 'Portugal 2010' scored against their opponents in the quarter-finals?
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"Portugal"})-[:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament {shortName:"WC", year:2010})
MATCH (team)-[:NAMED]->(squad:Squad)-[:FOR]->(tournament)
MATCH (player:Person)-[:REPRESENTS]->(team)
MATCH (player)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament)
WHERE match.stage="quarter final"
RETURN player, team, tournament, squad, scored, match, scored.minute, scored.type
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"Portugal"})-[relation5:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament {shortName:"WC", year:2010})
MATCH (team)-[relation6:NAMED]->(squad:Squad)-[relation7:FOR]->(tournament)
MATCH (player:Person)-[relation8:REPRESENTS]->(team)
MATCH (player)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[relation10:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament)
WHERE match.stage="quarter final"
RETURN relation10, relation8, relation7, relation6, relation5, player, team, tournament, squad, scored, match, scored.minute, scored.type
Semantic-EQL-Question: Can you identify the types and timing of goals made by Portuguese players in the quarter-final round of the 2010 World Cup tournament?

Question: Please provide the minutes of goals scored and the type of tournament matches played by any squad that the 'Netherlands' team named at 'Euro 2024'.
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"Netherlands"})-[:NAMED]->(squad:Squad)-[:IN_SQUAD]-(player:Person)
MATCH (player)-[scored_goal:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament {name:"Euro 2024"})
RETURN team, squad, player, scored_goal, match, tournament, scored_goal.minute, match.stage
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"Netherlands"})-[relation5:NAMED]->(squad:Squad)-[relation6:IN_SQUAD]-(player:Person)
MATCH (player)-[scored_goal:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[relation8:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament {name:"Euro 2024"})
RETURN relation8, relation6, relation5, team, squad, player, scored_goal, match, tournament, scored_goal.minute, match.stage
Rewrite: Provide the timing of goals and the category of tournament matches participated in by squads named by the 'Netherlands' at 'Euro 2024'.

Question: Identify the minute values and match stages for the goals scored by the 'Argentina' squad during the 'Group' and 'Final' stages of the '2018' tournament.
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"Argentina"})-[:NAMED]->(squad:Squad)
MATCH (player:Person)-[:REPRESENTS]->(team)
MATCH (player)-[scored_goal:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament {year:2018})
WHERE match.stage IN ["Group", "Final"]
RETURN team, squad, player, scored_goal, match, tournament, scored_goal.minute, match.stage
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"Argentina"})-[relation5:NAMED]->(squad:Squad)
MATCH (player:Person)-[relation6:REPRESENTS]->(team)
MATCH (player)-[scored_goal:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[relation8:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament {year:2018})
WHERE match.stage IN ["Group", "Final"]
RETURN relation8, relation6, relation5, team, squad, player, scored_goal, match, tournament, scored_goal.minute, match.stage
Rewrite: Determine the times and corresponding match phases when the 'Argentina' team scored goals during the 'Group' and 'Final' rounds of the '2018' tournament.

Question: What is the average, minimum, and maximum score by teams in all matches of the '2018 Russia' World Cup?
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[played:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[inTournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.name="2018 Russia"
RETURN AVG(played.score) AS AverageScore, MIN(played.score) AS MinimumScore, MAX(played.score) AS MaximumScore
Rewrite: What are the mean, lowest, and highest scores achieved by teams throughout all games of the '2018 Russia' World Cup?

Question: Could you calculate the total number of goals scored, the highest individual score, and the average score per match for the 'USA' team in 'Stanford 1994' matches?
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[participated:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament), 
      (team)-[playedInTeam:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[inTournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament)
WHERE team.name="USA" AND tournament.name="Stanford 1994"
WITH match, playedInTeam.score AS teamScore

// Calculate total goals
WITH SUM(teamScore) AS totalGoals, AVG(teamScore) AS avgScorePerMatch, MAX(teamScore) AS highestIndividualScore
RETURN totalGoals, highestIndividualScore, avgScorePerMatch
Rewrite: Can you compute the total goals, the top score by an individual, and the average score per game for the 'USA' team during the 'Stanford 1994' matches?

Question: Can you determine the average number of players per squad and the total number of coaches in all squads participating in 'FIFA 2010'?
Cypher:
MATCH (tournament:Tournament {name: "FIFA 2010"})<-[:FOR]-(squad:Squad)
WITH squad
MATCH (squad)<-[:IN_SQUAD]-(player:Person)
WITH squad, COUNT(player) AS playersPerSquad
WITH AVG(playersPerSquad) AS averagePlayersPerSquad
MATCH (tournament:Tournament {name: "FIFA 2010"})<-[:FOR]-(squad:Squad)<-[:COACH_FOR]-(coach:Person)
RETURN averagePlayersPerSquad, COUNT(DISTINCT coach) AS totalCoaches
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (tournament:Tournament {name: "FIFA 2010"})<-[relation6:FOR]-(squad:Squad)
WITH squad
MATCH (squad)<-[relation7:IN_SQUAD]-(player:Person)
WITH squad, COUNT(player) AS playersPerSquad
WITH AVG(playersPerSquad) AS averagePlayersPerSquad
MATCH (tournament:Tournament {name: "FIFA 2010"})<-[relation8:FOR]-(squad:Squad)<-[relation9:COACH_FOR]-(coach:Person)
RETURN averagePlayersPerSquad, COUNT(DISTINCT coach) AS totalCoaches
Rewrite: Could you calculate the average squad size in terms of players and the overall count of coaches across all teams in 'FIFA 2010'?

Question: What has been the total, average, and highest number of penalty scores recorded by teams in the 'quarter-finals' matches of the 'Euro 2000'?
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[playedIn:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[inTournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.name="Euro 2000" AND match.stage="quarter-finals"
RETURN SUM(playedIn.penaltyScore) AS totalPenaltyScores, AVG(playedIn.penaltyScore) AS averagePenaltyScores, MAX(playedIn.penaltyScore) AS highestPenaltyScore
Rewrite: How many penalty scores did teams record on average, in total, and at most during the 'quarter-finals' of 'Euro 2000'?

Question: I would like to know the lowest, highest, and average number of players from squads who have played in the 'Final' stage of the 'World Cup 2006'.
Cypher:
MATCH (tournament:Tournament {name: "World Cup 2006"})
MATCH (match:Match)-[inTournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament)
WHERE match.stage = "Final"
MATCH (squad:Squad)-[forSquad:FOR]->(tournament)
MATCH (player:Person)-[playedIn:PLAYED_IN]->(match)-[inTournament]->(tournament)
WITH squad, COUNT(DISTINCT player) AS playerCount
RETURN MIN(playerCount) AS LowestPlayerCount, MAX(playerCount) AS HighestPlayerCount, AVG(playerCount) AS AveragePlayerCount
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (tournament:Tournament {name: "World Cup", year: 2006})<-[relation4:IN_TOURNAMENT]-(match:Match {stage: "Final"})
MATCH (squad:Squad)-[relation5:FOR]->(tournament)
MATCH (person:Person)-[relation6:IN_SQUAD]->(squad)
RETURN MIN(size(collect(DISTINCT person))) AS MinPlayers, MAX(size(collect(DISTINCT person))) AS MaxPlayers, AVG(size(collect(DISTINCT person))) AS AvgPlayers
Rewrite: I'm interested in finding out the minimum, maximum, and mean count of players in teams that participated in the 'Final' phase of the 'World Cup 2006'.

Question: Could you provide the sum, average, and highest penalty scores by the 'Italy' team across matches of the '1994 USA' tournament?
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[playedIn:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[inTournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE team.name="Italy" AND tournament.name="1994 USA"
RETURN SUM(playedIn.penaltyScore) AS TotalPenaltyScore, AVG(playedIn.penaltyScore) AS AveragePenaltyScore, MAX(playedIn.penaltyScore) AS HighestPenaltyScore
Rewrite: Can you supply the total, mean, and maximum penalty points scored by the 'Italy' team during the '1994 USA' tournament matches?
